about-radio.required: Tell us what you are contacting us about

type-radio.required: Tell us the type of certificate that was ordered

existing-radio.required: Tell us if there is an existing order

previous-radio.required: Tell us you have already complained about this issue

additional-radio.required: Tell us if you have previously been in contact about this enquiry

how-radio.required: Tell us how you placed your order

which-radio.required: Tell us which service you paid for

when-date.required: Tell us when you placed your order
when-date.format: Enter the date in the correct format
when-date.future: The date is in the future

email-text.email: The email address isn't valid, enter a valid email address

postcode.postcode: This postcode isn't valid, enter a valid postcode
